features: CORDLESS DESIGN— Enjoy optimal maneuverability to get every wrinkle without the hassle of a tangled cord.
EQUIPPED FOR THE JOB— 1200 watts of power removes wrinkles from almost any fabric with variable temperature control for use on a variety of fabrics.
DRY OR STEAM IRON— Choose between dry or steam ironing with a spray mist option, or a burst of horizonal or vertical steam.
AUTO-OFF — Safety-centric design automatically turns off the iron if it is left idle for more than 8 minutes
IN THE BOX— Conveniently store the iron in its unique carrying case. The included measuring cup provides for easy refills.

SUPERIOR SUPPORT— When you choose a Steamfast product, you’re investing in superior performance and design that will deliver total satisfaction. If not, we’ll replace it, for 2 years. Supported by a customer service team based in Andover, KS.
Built to meet U.S. voltage requirements. Certified, safety-tested, and warrantied for use only in the U.S.
body.description: Product Description The all-new Steamfast SF-760 Cordless Steam Iron gives you optimal maneuverability to get every wrinkle. With a 7 second re-heating time and 30 second usage time, you will be able to remove wrinkles quickly and freshen your fabrics without the use of harsh chemicals. With a unique carrying case, this Steam Iron offers portability and is perfect for use at home and on the go. You can be confident that Steamfast products are built to perform, and are built to last. From the Manufacturer IMPORTANT INTERNATIONAL DISCLAIMER: This item is built to meet U.S. voltage requirements and may not function properly when used in conjunction with external devices that alter or convert voltage or frequency of electricity. Improper use or shipping the product outside the U.S. will void all warranties.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SF-760 Cordless Steam Iron The all-new Steamfast SF-760 Cordless Steam Iron gives you optimal maneuverability to get every wrinkle. With a 7 second re-heating time and 30 second usage time, you will be able to remove wrinkles quickly and freshen your fabrics without the use of harsh chemicals. With a unique carrying case, this Steam Iron offers portability and is perfect for use at home and on the go. You can be confident that Steamfast products are built to perform, and are built to last.

Burst or Continuous Steam The continuous steam switch allows for a constant flow of steam. The steam burst button provides a quick, powerful burst of steam for tough wrinkles. Dry Iron or Steam Iron Use the temperature control dial to select the various heat settings based on your fabric. Switch off the continuous steam button for dry ironing. Spray Mist Nozzle The spray button provides a mist of water for quick wrinkle removal. The water tank is designed to hold a maximum of 6.1 oz of water. Numerous Steam Outlets The non-stick ironing plate easily glides over fabric and has numerous steam outlet to help remove wrinkles and create precise creases.

Quick re-charge. The ironing plate will maintain its set temperature for 30 seconds. Set the cordless iron back on the base for 7 seconds to reheat the plate. When SF-760 is placed on the base and powered on, the iron will automatically shut off if not removed after 8 minutes. Convenient, portable design. The lightweight carry case provides a convenient, portable option for moving and storing the SF-760. When finished with your ironing and steaming tasks, conveniently hide the power cord in the cord storage located in the base. Vertical steaming. The cordless design eliminates a tangled and twisted power cord and provides unlimited portability. The SF-760 steam iron can be used for vertical steam bursts in addition to horizontal steam or dry ironing.

SF-710 Mini Steam Iron SF-760 Cordless Steam Iron Water Capacity 1.0 oz 5.7 oz Heating Time 45 sec. 30 sec., 7 sec. re-heat Dual Voltage No No Spray Mist No Yes Item Weight 1.1 lbs. 3.0 lbs. Item Dimensions 3.7"H x 3.0"W x 7.1"D 7.4"H x 6.0"W x 11.2"D Power Cord Length 6 ft. 6 ft. Watts 800 1200 Volts 120V 120V Hertz 60HZ 60HZ

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for teens.
reviews.reviewText: My teens love the portability of the iron, it does lose heat quick depending on what you’re ironing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heats up fast, turns itself off, works great with wool pad, easy transport, great buy
reviews.reviewText: I've had this iron for a while now and use it every weekend when working on a sewing project. At first I didn't like it. Infact, I almost sent it back. My mistake was thinking it would work like my big, regular iron and it doesn't. However, that is it's magic. It's not arm tiring heavy. There is no cord to get in the way and it magically turns itself off if I step away long enough. My regular iron does none of these things. The real eye opening moment was when I used it with a wool pad. It really shined then. It did not shine for me on a regular iron board or pad but a wool pad and the dial turned up far up to the proper setting worked wonders. It has a steam function that can be easily turned on or off and the steam function is good at getting out those pesky wrinkles if you're using a wool ironing pad. It has a carrying case lid and it's very easy and light to transport or to take with you to a friend's house or get together to sew. You also do not need a silicone pad as it rests in its base. I've had it up to max and I've not had any melting or anything of the base. Yes, it stays hot enough for me to make a pass or two and then I put it back in the base, making sure it's all the way back and it will click on and heat up quickly to remove and continue. It's well worth it's cost and I'm glad I didn't give up on it the first time I used it. I love it now and would buy another one in an instant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 4 Star is Only Due to Price
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a cheap way to find out if cordless irons are any good. This is small, heats up quickly and convenient. There are quite a few draw backs though. It does not get hot enough. I don't know if this is a cordless in general problem or specific to this iron, but it does not get as hot as my corded and doesn't not get hot enough for a lot of my projects. The iron "times out" and stops heating too fast. It is not very friendly for tossing something through the machine then pressing. By the time I have ran a few items through, it has stopped heating. Last being continuous ironing. I can't just keep ironing a big area like my whole quilt top without putting it back on the base to heat up multiple times. But I do like the price of it and I do like it for small items at my sewing table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars does not stay hot
reviews.reviewText: I don't know what this product was meant for, but it wasn't for doing more than one garment at a time. It does not hold heat well. no continuous steam for me, needs to be consistently reattached to base, but also difficult to reconnect, good thing amazon took it back for me, so i could try something else. This might be the perfect iron for someone who doesnt need a lot of heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this as a gift for my crafty spouse. She says it works great for her craft work and sewing projects. Perfect size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: i love that it's cordless and light weight. the big problem is: when placed on the base, it sometimes charges and sometimes not. it's very frustrating! I often have to pick it up replace it and over and over before the red light goes on to tell you it's charging. i would say the % rate of it going on to charge when it gets put back on the base is 40 - 50% very low..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best needed tool in my sewing room
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this, heats fast, love the cordless iron, the hidden built in area for the cord, the hard shell with clip locks easy to carry handle, small to fit in a cubicle for storage... Just love it, would buy it again.My only somewhat con: it shuts off fairly quick if not using, like if you return to the sewing machine to complete your project. But, on the positive side of that feature, it is great if you get pulled away for an interrupted house chore and forget about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This iron is Great for quilting and crafters!
reviews.reviewText: I love that this iron can literally go anywhere I need it. I purchased it for my quilting projects. I iron a little at a time, at my craft table or sewing table, then place it back in its charging port. It remains hot for a good 8 minutes before it needs charging again. Charging only takes a few seconds. It wasn't as good when ironing laundry. I had to keep charging it making this chore a bit frustrating. But I LOVE it for my quilting!
Algo péqueña y el tiempo que permanece caliente es de unos 20 segundos, creo qué pasó gasto mas tiempo planchando con ella que con mi plancha alambrica anterior, diseño bonito u buen material.

el diseño me gustó, pero realmente lo que deben explicar dentro de sus características es que dura 30 segundos caliente, la ofrecen como inalámbrica y en realidad no lo es, trae un cable que se conecta a la luz y es como planchar normalmente, apenas la quitas de su base y ya se enfrío. No cumple su función como inalámbrica, para eso mejor usar una plancha convencional o las que ofrecen en los hoteles si fuera de viaje.
Hay que estar esperando a que vuelva a calentar, no me adapto a ella!!
